intro: Podospermum scorzoneroides, commonly known as the silverleaf pimpernel, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is a perennial herb that typically grows in rocky or sandy soils, often in coastal or mountainous regions. The plant features small, clustered white or pale yellow flowers that bloom throughout the year. Its leaves are usually covered in a fine, silvery-white coating, which helps reflect sunlight and reduce water loss.
